title: From Evenepoel and Van der Poel to Pogačar and Powless: Ranking the world championships contenders
content:
Who's going to rule the elite men's road race this Sunday? We rate the favorites, dark-horses, and everyone in between.

Read the full article at From Evenepoel and Van der Poel to Pogačar and Powless: Ranking the world championships contenders on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
